data.title: Love this bag
data.body: This is a fantastic bag. I use it for my sales job and take it with me on sales calls. It holds everything I need, looks stylish and professional. May buy another one in a different color.

data.title: Holds EVERYTHING while looking stylish!
data.body:
I LOVE this bag. I did expect it to be a tiny bit more structured but overall I think the extra capacity that the "floppier" design allows for is so worth it, and it still looks great, full or not!

Pictured you can see my 15" laptop and laptop brick charger, ergo mouse, a box of flashcards, a folder with a full size Rocketbook and some thick paperwork stacks, lens cloths, peeps lens cleaner, lotion, menstrual products, a tablet, a web cam, headphones case, headset, power bank, various cables and adapters, a bunch of sharpies, some pens, a USB hub, a smaller Rocketbook, my snap on frames, and I STILL have room - believe it or not I also can fit a portable external monitor in here too and a slim water bottle can lay across the top of everything and it still zips closed.

I like the material, keeps my things dry, and is a great color. The straps are big enough to carry over my shoulder without issue even over a bulky wool coat. Loaded up it's heavy for sure but still comfortable with the padding on the straps.

I've been using it daily for about a month now, so I can't say much about the longevity but so far so good, I haven't run across any issues with the zippers or materials or anything ü§û

data.title: Great bag for work!
data.body: I just realized it has been three years since I got this bag and I thought it deserves a nice review. :) Nice, light weight, soft bag with lots of space and pockets. I like the separate laptop pocket. I chose light grey, it is a very nice color, looks like the photo. This bag lasted very well, no damage or scratches on it. I use it daily and also for travels. It holds a lot of stuff!

data.title: Perfect work tote!
data.body: This has been such a game changer for me. I work remote, but need to give presentations in the community. This bag fits my laptop, charger, HDMI cable, daily planner, notebook, numerous pens, portable medicine container, kindle, phone, keys, and has space for more. I absolutely ADORE this bag. It‚Äôs easy to clean, holds a lot, and is sturdy. Great purchase for the price.

data.title: Good bag
data.body: Super cute and good quality, just what I was hoping for! My laptop fits perfectly and the color of the bag is a great color for spring!

data.title: Good price, but came in a plastic bag, so it was already wrinkled before use.
data.body:
I‚Äôm aware that this is a bag that is less than $50, but it could at least already come free of wrinkles and in a box. It‚Äôs not structured to stand up on its own. The fact that they fold it to put in the bag doesn‚Äôt help, and is probably what caused all the wrinkles that are already on the outside of the bag. So it‚Äôs already kind of worn by the time you get it. I wanted to wear it anyway, but the outside material already looks wrinkled because of the way they folded it for packaging. Don‚Äôt waste your time if you‚Äôre looking for a bag that can stand on its own and is structured. You‚Äôll just have to pay the extra money.
My advice to the sellers, is to actually send it in a box so the bag can maintain its structure until the customers get a chance to use it.
The positives about the bag are that it does look like it‚Äôs picture. It can fit a very big laptop. It has very useful compartments. The material seems durable. And it comes with an extra linen bag for storing and instructions on how to maintain it. It‚Äôs very affordable.
I want to reiterate that the material itself does not come with any tears or problems. Besides, the wrinkle that was probably caused by the packaging for shipping.

data.title: Very nice briefcase/bag
data.body: I got this to match a blouse and 3 pc. suit that I have to wear on set. Usually I don‚Äôt know what to expect ordering from Amazon. But this bag delivered!!! It‚Äôs a very beautiful buttery gray color, looks/smells like real leather. Not cheaply made like some of the bags you get on Amazon. Very spacious Will look amazing with my suit. I think I will actually get one in each color. And also, not to mention, the color you see in the pics is the actual color you get. I know sometimes on Amazon the pics aren‚Äôt true to color. But this is. I am so glad I got this.

data.title: OBSESSED
data.body: This purse makes me feel like a WOMAN. So much space, durable material, and sleek. It goes with any outfit I wear and holds all of my things- whether its stuff for Bible study, traveling to a coffee shop to remote work, etc. 12/10 recommend.

data.title: Classy and perfect size
data.body:
The bag was well packed, so there would not be any crease lines. that was nice. this bag has ample storage the pockets are exactly the size as indicated in the description, so measure your laptop and other items to ensure proper fit. the laptop pad is adequate. quality zipper and Velcro for security. The bag does not stand on its own, but maybe once it is filled with items, but that is not an issue for me. It does have a flat bottom, maybe just a little working out will help. Overall- i really love this bag.
color is nice, i got the plum.

data.title: So Far GREAT-Have Received Compliments-Black Choice
data.body: Gave 4 stars as do not know how it will stand up over time yet. Holds A Great deal, take to work with Blender Ball 20 Oz container, smaller purse, some back up make up (just in case). Love the extra inside as well as outside pockets as keeps items organized. Additionally really appreciate the key holder (no more searching for them at the end of the day). The feet on the bottom also are helpful. When filled it is very stable and stands up. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a good size work tote! Celebrate and order it now. You will be happy that you did!

data.title: I like it, but‚Ä¶
data.body:
I recently started a new part-time job in a school, and for the first week of school I had been carrying my laptop and other items in a backpack, but the backpack made me feel a bit like one of the students. I wanted something that would make me feel both adult and professional to carry all my items. I loved this bag when viewing it on the Amazon page, and ordered it in brown. When it arrived, I was a bit disappointed in the color, as it it brighter and more ‚Äúorangey‚Äù looking in person than I was expecting. I was hoping it was a richer, more muted brown, but I‚Äôll deal with it. Also, as others have said, it stunk. There is a pretty strong, fishy smell, but it has been a few days since I received it, and the smell is dissipating.
I put my work stuff in it right away, and I love how there is a place for everything! My laptop fits great, along with a notebook, folder, hardcover book, and some purse items so I don‚Äôt have to carry both. That‚Äôs about all I initially had in there, but noticed that when I put it on my shoulder, the bottom sags. So that is the first real con for me. The first day I used it for work, I did feel more ‚Äúgrownup‚Äù if you will, and it did fit in a locking drawer I was given to keep my stuff in, which I was unsure of. However after work, I left from there and took my son to the orthodontist, then to a doctor appointment, and since I had put my purse items in here and left my purse at home, I noticed quickly how heavy this bag got‚Ä¶ and the lack of bottom structure.
I see reviews where people say the straps are not long enough to put on their shoulders, but it worked just fine for me. In fact I‚Äôd almost like them a bit shorter, since I‚Äôm only 5‚Äô3‚Äù. It would be nice if they were adjustable somehow, maybe with buckles. This is when I thought ‚ÄúHuh, maybe I WOULD like a shoulder strap on this bag‚Äù which hadn‚Äôt crossed my mind. When I got home I dug out a guitar strap that I had purchased for another purse (both also from Amazon), the hardware matched, so I attached it and we will see how that goes.
As for the support on the bottom, I measured inside the piping on the bottom of the bag and cut a piece of thick cardboard to fit‚Ä¶ which is when I noticed that the inside pockets are sewn to the bottom. This is normally a good thing, since I don‚Äôt want to have small things that I have to hunt for all over the bag because they‚Äôve slid under dividers, but in this case, it meant that I couldn‚Äôt just slide in my cardboard and move on. I cut it in half and fit it into one section of the bag, but couldn‚Äôt do much with the laptop compartment or the other side, as it was somehow an odd shape on one side because of how the laptop compartment was sewn to the side of the bag. Not sure what to do about this, or if I‚Äôll do anything at all, but these are the thoughts I‚Äôve had regarding this bag after having and using it for a couple days.

data.title: Obsessed
data.body: I was so tired of carrying around a purse that had no pockets so I went straight to Amazon to look for a new bag. This bag does not disappoint, so many pockets. Plus it's comfortable to wear and matches so many things.

data.title: It is big enough for my needs
data.body:
I received the bag yesterday. So, I cannot speak for its durability. It is the size I need, looks ok, has plenty of pockets and the color is a nice light grey.
.

data.title: Does not fit 15.6 laptop
data.body: Wrong color sent and won't hold my laptop. Nice looking and good quality.
Tengo varias semanas us√°ndolo para llevar todo a mi trabajo, soy profesora por lo que siempre va cargado. Me gusta que es compacto, no se deforma y soporta buen peso.

data.title: Stylish and affordable work bag!
data.body: I love the style and size of this bag! It arrived even better than expected from the pictures! I purchased for a work conference and it held everything needed including laptop, water bottle, notebook, snacks, etc. Highly recommend!!

data.title: Very cute bag and versatile, but heavy
data.body: I love this bag and it is a perfect way to carry my work laptop and supplies. However, the bag itself is quite heavy and hard to carry at times when filled. Carrying my work laptop, one book and my phone is so heavy it sometimes leaves marks on my elbow or shoulders where I was holding it.

data.title: Great work bag
data.body: I bought this when I started a new position and it has worked out great. It has many pockets and holds all of my stuff. The laptop pouch is super helpful and separates my computer. I also love they key ring holder so that I can find my keys in the bag easily.

data.title: Amazing storage in a beautiful purse!
data.body: There are many pockets in this purse that it fits everything! I mean everything haha - I was able to fit my iPad, snacks, umbrella, jacket, water bottle and much more. I would highly recommend if you are needing a formal purse or bag with space!

data.title: Redder than camel, decent bag
data.body:
Warning: "Brown" is very red and slightly darker than camel. I bought this hoping it would be similar in color to my Kate Spade camel-colored small purse, but it's really red and not a very nice color in general.

However, the bag appears to be decent quality, especially for the low cost. I haven't been using it long, but I have no complaints so far. It JUST fits my HP Zbook laptop, and it also fits a water bottle, lunch, small clutch purse, and charge cord just fine. Plenty of pockets to tuck things away and forget which of the million pockets you put it in!

data.title: Definitely worth the money!
data.body: Great size, looks chic but feels like pleather

data.title: You‚Äôll want this bag!!
data.body: I basically pack up my desk every night because I never know where I‚Äôll be the next day. This bag IS PERFECT! It holds a MacBook Pro, files, pens, charging cables and more. What I love most is how I have a compartment for everything to stay organized.

data.title: Great size! Perfect for a work bag
data.body: This bag is a great size, perfect for a laptop sized purse to take to the office. Looks nice and the brown tone matches some boots I have perfectly!

data.title: In love with this bag
data.body: I have nothing bad to say about this bag. The color is awesome. The bow is so so cute. It‚Äôs the perfect size for everything I need. I can fit my laptop and my iPad with room to spare. I love all the pockets that allow for organization. No weird smell. Buy this bag.

data.title: Perfect work girl laptop bag.
data.body: It is exactly what I was looking for. It‚Äôs not quite a purse and not quite a briefcase but a beautiful blend of the two.

data.body:
Can fit a 15 inch laptop üíª
Have a sturdy zipper in case of rain
Have a weird smell of old leather when unpacking it but fade away with time

data.title: Smart-looking bag
data.body: a lovely bag, however, it's a bit larger than I needed since I don't carry a laptop around. That's on me...

data.title: Stylish and Practical
data.body: I got this bag for when I started my new job and it holds: a tablet, two cell phones, glasses case, 2 1 inch binders, a large agenda, medium pencil case, and much more!! I was nervous getting the white color but so far there hasn't been any marks or damage done to it. I like to take care of my stuff but I am also not super gentle with it.

data.title: Cute and Practical
data.body: This is a very cute bag, it functions as intended and is very spacious. However, the interior is very "crinkly" and loud and after only 3 days of use, the bow Keychain is falling apart. I also wish the inner pockets were a little bigger so they could more easily fit a cellphone.

data.title: Holds up well
data.body: This bag is so well made. I‚Äôve been using it daily for 6 months and always have it packed full. The zippers are good quality and the straps hold up well to carrying a lot of weight. I love the amount of pockets it has for keeping my stuff organized.

data.title: Perfect laptop bag
data.body: My wife absolutely loves this‚Ä¶most importantly it hold her laptop as well as all the other stuff she carries around daily.

data.title: Classy
data.body: I'm very pleased with the size and quality

data.title: Great size and varied compartments.
data.body: Like the shape and size of this tote with it‚Äôs varied compartments and padding for my iPad. Haven‚Äôt used it yet but am looking forward to doing same.

data.body: Nice quality and a good design!

data.title: Fantastic every day tote
data.body: This is my go to work bag. Absolutely love. Great size for my laptop and other items. High quality.

It fits my laptop and a lot of extra things and the arm straps are comfortable and wide enough to fit over my jackets. Not the most beautiful bag, but it does the job!

data.title: Perfect!
data.body: This bag is beautiful and perfect for my laptop and other travel items!

data.title: Exactly as described
data.body: Excellent quality. Spacious.

data.title: wish there was an optional longer strap
data.body: great bag, many useful compartments, stylish for office commute, but the shoulder straps are a little short for me if i‚Äôm wearing a big jacket (reference i‚Äôm 5‚Äô10‚Äùish so it could just be bc my hand-to-elbow length is above average but could be helpful for my fellow tall queens)

data.title: Great bag!
data.body: I use if for work and can fit my computer, large notebook, planner, 3 folders, small notebook and a small pouch of pens/pencils. And still a little room. Love it!

data.title: Cute, but smaller than I expected
data.body:
UPDATE 2/20/24: The straps on this bag are way too short. The overall size of the straps made it difficult to keep this bag on my shoulder at any point during use, but last week through a series of unfortunately-timed-events, this poorly designed strap length led to me losing my balance and being thrown off one of those electric scooters. Not necessarily the bag‚Äôs fault, but also those shoulder straps being so short were a huge contributing factor in my particular accident. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô4‚Äù, 130lb, so not a terribly large person, and these shoulder straps were too short for me (and can‚Äôt be adjusted). I love the quality of this bag and will be replacing it with a backpack from the same brand, but the small construction details like size of bag/length of straps/straps not being adjustable/etc are just not a good fit for my needs.

//

I bought this bag because an old bag of mine (different brand) was warping and I needed a bag to take to work. It advertised being able to fit a 15.6‚Äù laptop, which is why I picked this bag. Technically, it does fit my 16‚Äù MacBook, but it‚Äôs a tight squeeze‚Ä¶and the laptop is actually only 14‚Äù across! Also, I can‚Äôt zip up the bag with the laptop inside, which is a huge downside to me.

Overall the bag is cute and functional (just barely) so I‚Äôll be using it! But I probably wouldn‚Äôt buy again unless they had a bigger size.

data.title: Perfect for me!
data.body: I wanted a purse sized bag for my laptop and accessories and this was it. It‚Äôs heavy to be sure but when the laptop is out it‚Äôs just right. I use it every day I work in office.

data.title: Holds my laptop and necessary items; no problem.
data.body: Quality is awesome. Price was awesome.

data.title: We‚Äôll made, tons of space, SUPER CUTE!
data.body: Such a cute bag and lots of room! I have used this bag everyday for a month and it looks brand new! I have received tons of compliments and I plan to order another one in a different color!

data.title: Cute Workbag

data.title: Can fit alot of stuff, and feels like it will hold up a long time
data.body: This bag has exceeded my expectations. You can definitely fit a lot of stuff in it. I use it as my every day purse, and I can put even more stuff for work in it when i go to work. and even though it can get heavy, the straps are quite comfortable on my shoulder.

data.title: Nice bag
data.body: Bag is of nice quality. I wish the inside was fabric instead of the plastic like material.

data.title: Was sent a previously used item
data.body: This was a gift. When recipient opened, discovered was a "used and returned" item. Found the pen in the main body of the bag and the note in an outside pocket. Likely used for an interview or presentation and returned after. I would not have minded gifting a returned item as the recipient did like the bag but we were a little appalled that bag was not checked on return before sending out again! I was embarassed.

data.title: Love this bag!
data.body: I needed a smaller laptop tote for work; most of them were HUGE, but this is just the right size, it's stylish and classy and I love the soft feel. I ordered the black "leather look" bag. It holds my Dell Latitude, by Samsung tablet, phone, wallet and there's room for more. I love the attached clip to keep track of my keys! I knocked one star off because it is very slouchy as many reviews have stated, and I'm not sure how the inner material will hold up. The inside looks satiny, but is actually like a plasticy windbreaker type of material (for lack of better way of describing it). Overall, I LOVE the bag so far and would consider getting in another color.

data.title: Great bag
data.body: I will be using this bag for student teaching and it‚Äôs perfect because there is so much storage and has a nice place for a laptop right in the middle so it will be protected. I love all the different compartments for folders, papers, pens etc. Before purchasing I looked at many other reviews about the bag being floppy and not standing up right which was somewhat the case for me but once you actually start putting a good amount in it it‚Äôs great. I think it just needs to be worn in a little, but yeah don‚Äôt let that scare you from getting this bag it‚Äôs a perfect size and fits everything I need perfectly!

data.title: Perfect Tote
data.body: I am really glad I decided to purchase this. I needed a bag to carry my work belongings in back and fourth to work. It fits everything including my laptop, charger, 2 notebooks, water, and room for more. The quality is great too.

data.title: Classy and sturdy!
data.body: I've been looking for a good bag for work, and this one has all the details I need! Ample pockets, a zip top, space for laptop, and is sturdy. Looks good too!

data.title: Plenty of space
data.body: This purse is great for on the go or while traveling to and from your workplace. I like how it has a strap to keep your laptop or ipad in place while you are moving. There are plenty of pockets to store different items. I like how you can button up the purse with the magnet or use the zipper to close your purse. Would recommend this purse for any neutral loving girlies.

data.title: Nice bag
data.body: Overall a nice size work bag!

data.title: Black bag
data.body: I‚Äôve had this bag for a couple weeks and it fits everything I need in a work bag. After years of wearing a laptop backpack I‚Äôm excited to look like a grown up. No smell like some people reported. It also stands up just fine.

data.title: cute but not hefty
data.body: as a high school senior I'd gotten this to try out not using a back pack. it's cute and more mature which is what I wanted. however after a semester of carrying all my things (which I admit is a lot) the zipper broke. probably my fault. do with that what u will. but it's not for carrying what u would in a backpack.

data.title: very nice laptop bag
data.body: This laptop bag is exactly what I was looking for. It hold my laptop, mouse, snacks and my water bottle and there is room for pens, and paper as well. Plus it looks better than the bag I previously had which had a flap top and no cushions inside the two zippered compartments.

data.title: THIS IS AWESOME!
data.body: This has been such a fantastic purchase! I use this bag for carrying around my school stuff during the week. It has more than enough pockets, amazing color, and it comes with a storage bag for when not in use.

data.title: I LOVE this bag!

Be warned, it does get heavy quickly and doesn't distribute weight well, but that's pretty much my only complaint, which is basically every purse issue? Regardless, I totally recommend!

data.title: Nice, not amazing

It holds my 13 inch MacBook and that is about it; you cannot overstuff it. As a slimline computer bag, it looks professional. The Cyan Blue color is subtle and feminine.

data.title: Great laptop bag
data.body:
This bag has all the pockets you need. Holds laptop in cushioned pocket with velcro security close, then zipper pocket to hold mouse , cord, and other accessorizes, and another large section for documents and files. Outer pockets are great for phone and keys. Love the colors.
Only thing missing us a shoulder strap.

data.title: Very cute
data.body: This fit my laptop perfectly and I love the different compartments. It‚Äôs also very sturdy.

data.title: Beautiful and Spacious Bag.
data.body: This bag is big and beautiful! It contains my 15.6 in laptop, notebooks and wallet. I love it

data.title: Falls off and the strap is TOO long
data.body: I am a commuting a lot this semester of school and got this bag for that purpose. It fits my 15.6 laptop, charger, gloves, earmuffs, 32 oz hydro flask, keys, wallet, Beats Pro, and some smaller items so the size is great! However, it falls off my shoulder and makes commuting very painful and difficult. Further, the strap it comes with is too long and causes the bag to hang too low, thus it makes it more uncomfortable. Additionally, the material is a magnet for dust.

data.title: Love this bag for work
data.body: I am so glad I bought this bag for work. It holds my laptop and everything else I need. It is classic, elegant, and great quality. I like using the small outer pocket for to slip in my phone.

data.title: Very cute, great color
data.body: I got this to replace an old laptop bag. It's very cute and fits my IdeaPad flex 5 perfectly.

data.title: Decent
data.body: Bag is alright. After only two months of daily use the strap is already starting to wear down. Some of the stitches have become undone. It holds a lot of stuff, just not the best quality. If you‚Äôre looking for a cheap work bad to throw around daily then this is a good option.

data.title: Happy with it
data.body: Not a bad bag. Bought it for my wife and she likes it.

data.title: Looks sturdy and functional but color is off
data.body: I purchased the 'brown' tote. Color is more orange-brown. Purchased for a gift so will see whether recipient is okay with color. Overall, though, the bag seems sturdy and functional with areas for a laptop and paperwork plus pockets.

data.title: Nice tote
data.body: The bag is nice as it was presented in the photos. It gives you a good feeling of confidence when buying from an online platform. It makes you to keep in buying.

data.title: Love it for work
data.body: I get some many compliments and it‚Äôs super roomy!

data.title: Nice bag
data.body: The bag is stylish but a bit uncomfortable

data.title: Love it, but only after enhancements
data.body:
Cons
*No shoulder strap: this is normally a dealbreaker for me and becasuse of that, it was only by oversight that I looked at this bag at all. Glad I did, though. The handles on this bag are attached by gold metal rings, which is similar to the worn out bag I'm replacing, so I was able to use the old shoulder strap with this bag.

*No bottom padding: the thick padding on the sides of the laptop sleeve is excellent, and I feel very confident that my laptop is protected from bumps and scratches. The velcro strap closure at the top is a bonus to secure the laptop tightly. But there's a noticeable thump when I set the bag down - there seems to be no padding at all on the bottom or the bag, so the laptop is not protected against impact at the bottom. Again, I'm replacing a different bag, so was able to cut some of the padded lining from that bag and tuck it in at the bottom of this bag, so it's not pretty but it works.

*Lining color: the bag is black, the lining is brown. I really wish it could be a light or bright color to make it easier to see things inside. I guess brown is better than black, but it's still a rather dark abyss inside.

Pros
* I LOVE THE POCKETS - especially the crossover pockets on the front. I had assumed they were for style only, but there's a magnetic closure on the big one, and the 'outside v' pocket is only half the size, making it perfect for reading glasses and a phone. The back zip pocket and interior sections keep me organized, and the whole bag zips closed on top even when I have all my stuff in those pockets.

* Key chain - this isn't a feature I care about, but turns out I really like it because it has clips on both ends. One attaches to a metal ring inside the bag, the other for keys. I clipped both ends to the ring, making a loop from the strap, and it's just the right size to corral my water bottle to keep it from tipping inside the bag.

* Attractive and waterproof - I've only had it for a week, so can't speak to durability or quality of waterproofing yet, but that's an added bonus for when I set the bag on floors that get wet during snowy winters. I assume I'll be able to just wipe the bag down if it gets dirty.

Overall, I'm happy with the bag, but I did have to tweak it a bit.

data.title: Nice bag for the price
data.body: This is a nice bag that easily carries my 14‚Äù laptop and accessories and some office supplies. I also wish it were a little more sturdy on the bottom. Nobody is going to think this is high end leather but it‚Äôs modern and stylish and not too clunky. At this price I will order it in a couple more fun colors.

data.title: Super cute laptop bag/purse
data.body: I like my new laptop purse as I call it. Very stylish especially for the price. Works great to hold my laptop and accessories. I would recommend it.

data.title: Great size but‚Ä¶
data.body: It‚Äôs a great size. Fits my iPad with its protective sleeve as well as a bunch of other office accessories I need on the go. Very soft material, inside looks durable. Only complaint is the stitching is already coming undone. Other than that, great purchase

data.title: Great for a work bag

Veo que los materiales son muy buenos y la confecci√≥n tambi√©n. En cuanto a la durabilidad, lo ir√© verificando con el uso.

data.title: It's beautiful and functional

data.title: Missing shoulder strap for traveling but otherwise excellent
data.body: I use it daily for carrying all my work and computer stuff in, and I love it. The only thing I miss is a solid shoulder strap, preferably detachable, since it gets quite heavy when full and the handles are a bit too short for comfort when traveling.

data.title: It‚Äôs a red color with a hint of brown
data.body: The picture of the brown bag is not accurate to what I received. The bag was really red with just a bit of brown to it. Disappointed but just don‚Äôt want to deal with the hassle of returning.

data.title: Great buy
data.body: Lots of room for everything and very durable It did good being in the rain

data.title: I loved it
data.body: It‚Äôs same as described

data.title: Better thank expected
data.body: This bag fits everything and is a great quality. The brown color is beautifu.

data.title: Just brought this bag on a trip to San Diego
data.body: It was fabulous! I was able to carry my laptop, iPhone, wallet, makeup, pens, masks. Everything stayed so neat and organized. Fit nicely under my airline seat. It was just a perfect travel bag plus it looks really nice.

data.title: Fits in locker, holds documents + everything you own
data.body: I never write reviews but this bag has impressed me more than anything I've ever gotten from Amazon lmao. It is ginormous, fits literally everything I could possibly hope to own, and it still fits in my 12x12 locked at work. I keep documents, a knitting project, snacks, and every typical item you keep in a purse all in here and there's room to spare. It's insane, it's genuinely like a Mary Poppins esque black hole that anything fits in. I could forego a lunchbox entirely if I felt like it because everything would fit in this stupid thing, it's incredible. I might buy two more in different colors I'm just that appreciative of it

data.title: It‚Äôs eh
data.body: It‚Äôs okay. It doesn‚Äôt look to bad but definitely has no structure. Even when it‚Äôs full of stuff, it slouches. The pictures made it look nicer than the purse actually is. It‚Äôs cute enough to keep but just know it looks cheaper in real life as compared to the pictures.

data.title: Great laptop purse for the price!
data.body:
This bag is very cute. Absolutely love the exterior folded pocket. It has plenty of room for a laptop, iPad, books, chargers, etc. there‚Äôs one large zip up pocket in the middle

Just a warning to buyers, the bag isn‚Äôt completely waterproof from the outside. Like most purses, the zipper extends the purse opening (not perfectly fitted) so there is a small opening where water could get in. If you live in a highly weathered area it may be something worth looking into!

The material seems thick & durable, yet soft like leather. Thankfully the one I received did NOT smell bad lol. The bag is slightly limp, but that isn‚Äôt necessarily a bad thing. The interior is okay, not my favorite, but it works!

data.title: Spacious But Has Mediocre Construction
data.body: The bag has a lot of space which is the number one feature I was looking for. Unfortunately, there are some downsides to this bag. Namely, the material is much thinner than it appears in the product photos leading to unattractive wrinkling of the bag. This seriously detracts from the elegant sleek look of the bag that I was looking for and was presented by the product photos. Secondly, the segment between the computer sleeve and the front of the bag is extremely narrow to the point you can barely reach in to retrieve pens from their holders sown into the bag. I don't think this will be as much of an issue if you have a smaller computer as it seems part of the issue is the way the bag is stretched by the device. However, it is worth noting that the computer I use is within the measurements that this bag is advertised to fit. On the plus side of thinks it is pretty cute for a bag of it's size. The straps are also reasonably comfortable and its nice how the bag had multiple sections unlike your standard tote. Will update after a few months about durability.

data.title: I would recommend this product 5 stars
data.body:
I am absolutely thrilled with my purchase of the Laptop Tote Bag for Women, lots of pockets! This bag has exceeded all my expectations and more. The combination of waterproof leather and sleek design not only gives it a professional look but also provides the ultimate protection for my 15.6-inch laptop.

The attention to detail in the craftsmanship is truly remarkable. The stitching is precise, the zippers glide effortlessly, and the overall build feels incredibly durable. It's evident that this bag is designed to last.

What sets this bag apart is its functionality. The spacious interior accommodates my laptop perfectly, and there's still ample room for documents, notebooks, and even a charger. The multiple compartments and pockets are a lifesaver for keeping my belongings organized. No more digging around to find my phone or keys!

The ergonomic design makes it comfortable to carry even when fully loaded. The sturdy handles don't dig into my shoulders, and the optional adjustable shoulder strap is a thoughtful addition for when I need to go hands-free.

In conclusion, if you're a woman in need of a reliable, stylish, and practical laptop bag, look no further. This Laptop Tote Bag for Women ticks all the boxes and then some. It's a purchase I'll continue to cherish, and I wholeheartedly give it five stars!

data.title: Love this bag!
data.body: Bought for my daughter to commute to work. Very stylish & it's roomy enough for everything! Might get another one for myself.

data.title: Color is awesome and love the size!!
data.body: The best part is the color!! The large size was exactly what I was looking for!!

data.title: Roomy, nice color and features
data.body: This tote is roomy enough to fit a large laptop in a special compartment, has lots of additional compartments and a key holder. The color was very pretty as well and I received multiple compliments on it. Not real leather, which is clearly stated, but a good value and quality for the price.

data.title: This bag is perfect!
data.body:
I was not expecting much but this bad def prove me completely wrong.
Size, bag, pockets are perfect for all my work items.
I also have room for my water bottle (did not take pic).
Color was so spot on.
It also came with a bag when I need to store away.
